info.title: Picol API
info.description: Alpha testing of new RCMS API

parameters.name: topics_keyword_cond
parameters.description: Change the way of narrowing down by keyword (Default: AND)

parameters.name: contents_type[]
parameters.description: The ID from the displayed category. All data will be displayed when this is not set.

parameters.name: contents_type_cond
parameters.description: Change the way of narrowing down by category ID (Default: OR)

parameters.name: ext_column_cond
parameters.description:
ext_column condition type (Default:OR)
To specify an ext_col number set: 'ext_column_{no}_cond'

parameters.name: tag_category_id
parameters.description: ID of the tag category to be displayed. (Default: All)

parameters.name: tag_search
parameters.description: narrowed by the value of the tag id.  yes:1 no:0

parameters.name: tag_id[]
parameters.description: Tag IDs that you would like to display

parameters.name: tag_cond
parameters.description: Change the way to narrow down tags (Default: OR)

parameters.name: exclude_tag_id
parameters.description: Tag IDs that you would like to hide

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Set the sort order. Available param {0}

topics_flg.description: Display all topics to logged in members, regardless ther public/hidden status

tag_id.description:
タグID
* 75 => 推しキャラ(Favorite character)
* 76 => いい感じの何か(good stuff)
* 67 => 近況(Now)
* 68 => ランチ(Lunch)
* 69 => おやつ(Snack)
* 70 => 仕事関係
* 71 => ただしい(Do right)
* 72 => たのしい(Delight)
* 73 => ジレンマ(dilemma)
* 74 => めでたい
* 162 => おやつ
* 163 => sakura
* 164 => 桜
* 166 => 景色
* 171 => 重要なお知らせ
* 173 => ここにタグを設置できます
* 174 => MalaysiaOffice
* 175 => 近況

file_id.description: File ID returned by File Upload API

id.description: File ID. Whether the item should be updated or inserted depends on this ID being set or not.
